type.title: Type
type.validationMessage: Required. Type of the document. Should be selected in the list below.

title.title: Title
title.description: Required. Entire title without statement of responsibility.
title.validationMessage: Required. Entire title without statement of responsibility.

titlesProper.title: Proper or uniformed title
titlesProper.description: Uniform title, a related or an analytical title that is controlled by an authority file or list, used as an added access point.

languages.title: Languages
languages.description: List of languages for the resource.

language.title: Language
language.description: Required. Language of the resource, primary or not.
language.validationMessage: Required. Language of the resource, primary or not.

translatedFrom.title: Translated from
translatedFrom.description: Language from which a resource is translated.

items.validationMessage: Should be in the ISO 639 format, with 3 characters, ie eng for English.

authors.title: Authors
authors.description: Author(s) of the resource. Can be either persons or organisations.

pid.title: pid
pid.description: Corresponding pid of the MEF record.

type.title: Type
type.description: Identify if the author is a person or an organisation.

date.title: Date
date.description: Information about the birth and the death of a person. Helpful to disambiguate people.

qualifier.title: Qualifier
qualifier.description: Information about the person, ie her profession. Helpful to disambiguate people.

publicationYear.title: Date of publication
publicationYear.description: Date of the publication. This must be an integer, ie 1989, 453, -50. Used to sort search results. Once this field is set, a free formed date of publication can be added in the next field.
publicationYear.validationMessage: Have to be an integer, from -9999 to +2050. Zero prefixes aren't needed.

freeFormedPublicationDate.title: Date of publication (free formed)
freeFormedPublicationDate.description: Date of the publication in a free form. If there's a normalized date of publication, then a free formed date can be added to be displayed.

extent.title: Extent
extent.description: Extent of the resource, ie number of pages or volumes.

otherMaterialCharacteristics.title: Other Material Characteristics
otherMaterialCharacteristics.description: Other Material Characteristics, ie illustrations, black and with or coloured.

formats.title: Format
formats.description: Format of the resource, ie dimensions in cm.

additionalMaterials.title: Additional materials
additionalMaterials.description: Accompanying material of the resource, ie maps.

series.title: Series
series.description: Series to which belongs the resource.

number.title: Numbering
number.description: Numbering of the resource within the series.

identifiers.title: Identifiers
identifiers.description: Persistent identifiers of the resource, ie reroID and ISBN.

reroID.title: reroID
reroID.description: Corresponding reroID of the original RERO record.

bnfID.title: bnfID
bnfID.description: Corresponding bnfID of the original BNF record.

isbn.title: ISBN
isbn.validationMessage: Should be a valid ISBN-13 without dashes.
